Package uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda

Interface Summary
SimulationListener This is a listener interface for receiving events/notifications from a Simulator.
 

Class Summary
PrintStreamMonitor This class handles obtaining data about a simulation (via events) and outputting it to a PrintStream as text.
SimulationEvent This event indicates an event has occurred during a Simulation and encapsulates information about that event.
SimulationViewer This class is a scrollable container for the simulation visualisation.
It builds on the JScrollPane to add a 'grabbable' movement feature.
Simulator This class is responsible for bringing together the various parts of the simulator and executing a simulation.
SimulatorTools This is a static class which provides general tools to the Simulator.
Visualiser This is class handles visualising a simulation.
XMLMonitor This class handles obtaining data about a simulation (via events) and outputting it to a XML file.
 

Enum Summary
MonitorPhase This is an enumerated type that the monitors use to track the stage the simulation being monitored is in.
 

Exception Summary
UnsuitableMapException An exception for use when a MobilityMap is not suitable for a Simulator.
UnsuitableMobileObjectsException An exception for use when a set of MobileObjects is not suitable for a Simulator.
